channel.title: Android on goParker
channel.description: Recent content in Android on goParker

item.title: Boarding the Android Express
item.description: Today I took possession of my shiny new Samsung Galaxy Note II. My previous daily device was the Samsung Omnia 7 which was one of the debut devices of the Windows Phone 7 range. It was a close run race between the Note II and the flagship Windows Phone 8 device the Nokia Lumia 920. I mentioned before that it was a close race with the Lumia phone. Both are large, flagship devices with the Lumia being widely lauded as having one of the best cameras on a mobile phone, the best in low light.
